In pursuit of this, we cultivate academic excellence, communicate with communities of scholars, policy-makers, practitioners, as well as the general public, and we engage in shaping the global peace research agenda." />

        <div class="exposition">
            <p>The <b>Peace Research Institute Oslo (PRIO)</b> conducts research on the conditions for peaceful relations between states, groups and people. <span class="more"><a href="/About/">Read more about PRIO</a></span></p>
        </div>

<div id="footer" class="footer">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-sm-4">
            <h3>Independent &ndash; International &ndash; Interdisciplinary</h3>
            <p>The Peace Research Institute Oslo (PRIO) conducts research on the conditions for peaceful relations between states, groups and people.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-4">
            <h3>PRIO.org</h3>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="/News/">News</a></li>

                <li><a href="/People/">People</a></li>
                <li><a href="/Data/">Data</a></li>
                <li><a href="/Education/">Education</a></li>
                <li><a href="http://blogs.prio.org">Blogs</a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-4">
            <h3>About PRIO</h3>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="/About/">About PRIO</a></li>
                <li><a href="/About/How-to-find/">How to Find</a></li>

                </div>
